39.TitleEnglish: Thunder Empire of Friendship! Geargod Rebels?

40.TitleEnglish: A New Buddy! The Clockwork Mighty Sun Fighter!

41.TitleEnglish: Gao versus CHAOS Gao! Autodeity Formation Completed!

45.TitleEnglish: Robo of Urban Legends? Hanako WC Appears!

46.TitleEnglish: Shine bright! Overturn Shining Dragoner, Jackknife!

47.TitleEnglish: The Power That Surpasses Deities! The Ultimate Chaos!!

48.TitleEnglish: Gao versus Keisetsu! Return of the Chaos Three!

49.TitleEnglish: Wisdom's Ambition! The Terrifying Upgrade Declaration!

50.TitleEnglish: Final Plan Activated! New World Chaos!

51.TitleEnglish: Final Battle! Gao Mikado versus Wisdom!

1.TitleEnglish: The GGG Cup Opens! All-Star Assemble!
1.SummaryEnglish: Guru Bunbuku organizes an amazing Buddyfight tournament for Gao, featuring familiar faces and a whole bunch of surprises. Gao reunites with his first Buddy, Drum.

2.TitleEnglish: Gao versus Kanata! Batzz, Drum and Bal, United!
2.SummaryEnglish: Gao faces Kanata in the first match of the GGG Cup Tournament. The Guru reveals the next special guest, and Noboru shows off his new power.

3.TitleEnglish: Final Boss All-Out Attack! Who's the Bad Guy?
3.SummaryEnglish: The GGG Cup continues as Noboru faces Ikazuchi's Hundred Demons and Kyoya Gaen and Wisdom pit their unique flag cards against each other. Meanwhile, Guru Bunbuku has a prophetic dream warning of villainy.

4.TitleEnglish: Paruko's a Baby? Gao's First Commentary!
4.SummaryEnglish: When an accident transforms Paruko into a baby, it's up to Gao to provide commentary on the Buddyfight match between Gaito and Tasuku. Guru Bunbuku and Gao's buddies are in a race against time to find the cure.

5.TitleEnglish: Burn Brightly, Noboru! A Tear-Soaked Serious Buddyfight!
5.SummaryEnglish: Gao's friends begin to suspect that there's more to the GGG Cup Tournament than meets the eye. Noboru confronts Gao about his secretive behavior during their semi-final match.

6.TitleEnglish: Dauntless! Purgatory Knight versus Supreme Dragon Deity of Creations!
6.SummaryEnglish: Gao and his friends are mystified when Kyoya Gaen asks Tasuku to face him as the Purgatory Knight for the second Semi-Final round of the GGG Cup.

7.TitleEnglish: Showdown of Destiny! Gao Mikado versus Tasuku Ryuenji!
7.SummaryEnglish: Gao's friends prepare for Gao's departure before the GGG Cup's final match begins.

8.TitleEnglish: See You Again! Mighty Sun Fighter Forever!
8.SummaryEnglish: The finals of the GGG Cup comes to a close! Tasuku has released Jackknife "Granthese" against Gao. However, Gao doesn't give up and fights back with his own powerful card.

1.SummaryEnglish: Yuga and his best friend Ranma spend their days trying to become the next viral video stars. But when Yuga finds a mysterious card in his room, he's drawn into the world of Buddyfight, where his very own Buddy monster is waiting for him.

3.TitleEnglish: Clash of the Aces! Ace of Games versus Ace of Study!

4.TitleEnglish: The Transfer Student is the Ace of Sports!

5.TitleEnglish: It's Finally Begun! The ABC Cup!

6.TitleEnglish: Ranma's Wild Charge! I'm The One Who'll Win!

7.TitleEnglish: Mel's Adventures in Fairyland! Reverse Subaru's Curse!

8.TitleEnglish: A Deity Descents! Electrodeity of Light, Amaterasu!

9.TitleEnglish: Defend the Peace! Galaxy Exalt Cosmoman!

10.TitleEnglish: Win the Rematch! Yuga versus Subaru!

11.TitleEnglish: ABC Cup Finals! Yuga versus Masato!

12.TitleEnglish: Who's the Academy's Best Fighter? The card that Determines Victory!

13.TitleEnglish: Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 1!

14.TitleEnglish: Lost World! Vile Demonic Dragon, Vanity Husk Destroyer! Part 2!

15.TitleEnglish: Get Stronger, Yuga! A New Beginning!

16.TitleEnglish: Shop Preliminaries Begin! Samurai versus Ninja!

17.TitleEnglish: Checkmate! Ace of Study versus Chess Genius!

18.TitleEnglish: Our New Ally? A Non-Evil Da-Dan?!

19.TitleEnglish: The Vile Ranma Channel Debuts? The Return of Lost World!

21.TitleEnglish: Yuga and Banjoe! A Fiery Fight!

22.TitleEnglish: Masato or Kanesada? Shop Preliminary Finals!

23.TitleEnglish: The Secondary Round begins! A Challenge from Vile Ranma!

24.TitleEnglish: Mage Garga! A Magic World Buddyfight!

25.TitleEnglish: The Third Lost World Fighter! Enter the MAX Dragons!

27.TitleEnglish: The Secret Origin of the Linkdragon Order! Get Stronger, Agito!

29.TitleEnglish: I'm going to play too! Buddyfight!

30.TitleEnglish: Who Will Win? Subaru Versus Masato!

31.TitleEnglish: The Guardian of Order, Eden Hanazono!

32.TitleEnglish: Major Evolution! Vile Demonic Deity Dragon, Vanity Epoch Destroyer!

34.TitleEnglish: Da Dan Rebels! The Forbidden Coup d'Etat!

35.TitleEnglish: Garga's Major Evolution! Activate, Deity G.Evo!

36.TitleEnglish: Unhappy! Vile Ranma versus Rei Urameshi!

38.TitleEnglish: Come Back, My friend! Casting a Spell with a Wish!

40.TitleEnglish: Vile Demonic Husk Deity Dragon, Vanity End Destroyer!

41.TitleEnglish: Who Will Use It? The Anti-Lost Weapon!

42.TitleEnglish: Final Battle! Yuga versus Vile Ranma!

43.TitleEnglish: Let it Loose! Deity Creations Fangflare, Gargantua Punisher!
